row.SpecialText:
Cheat mode: Enter 'EASYMODE' at the high score screen. Then, press one of the following keys to activate the corresponding cheat function.
Effect Key Level skip with no bomb collisions [F9] Level skip u or o Only three aliens on screen [F4] Strange effects [F10] First bonus round atari Bonus round i Disable cheat mode [F8]

row.ProgeammerName: Tony Cooper, Tony West, Stephen Robertson
row.SpecialText: On the title screen press the space bar, type in RAISTLIN and press the space bar once more for infinite ships.

The official ELITE cheat. When asked for the code word from the manual, type SARA. Now type in the correct word when prompted and begin play. Press the * key to access the hacker screen, where bytes and variables can be changed to suit.
CHANGE BYTE FOR
32 to 01 Cloaking Device 31 to 01 ECM Jammer 20 to 01 Escape Capsule 23 to 01 Energy Bomb 24 to 01 Energy Unit 26 to 01 Docking Computer 28 to 01 Galactic Hyperdrive 80 to 01 Document 84 to 01 Fugitive Rating 85 to 01 Offender Rating 88 to 01 Mostly Harmless Rating 88 to 01-08 Poor - Elite rating 1F to 01 Fuel Scoop 34 to 03 Cargo Hold 7C to 01 Unhappy Refugees
Press ESC to get back to the game.
row.CRCValue: Version 1.01

row.SpecialText: Slow down to minimum speed and select F for fixed gunsights. Pause the game and type JS ARG S followed by RETURN, then type JS ARG S and hit RETURN again. Pressing M stops all enemies in their tracks, while P awards an extra missile. N gives an extra 5000 points to your score.
Hold down 'k' on the keyboard while the game is loading. This will give you a home army of 1024 knights and a campaign army of 1024 knights. Do you get the joke here? (Knights/Bytes)
Whilst playing the game, pause it and press HELP five times for infinite lives!

Vehicle locations:
Coordinates Fuel 133, O67 1/2 tank 177, 197 1/3 tank 007, 241 1/8 tank 005, 144 1/2 tank 177, 059 1/8 tank 137, 047 1/3 tank 225, 032 1/2 tank
Important locations:
Item Coordinates Security pass 90, 153 Master key 164, 169 Old man 181, 197 Second man 99, 61 Third man (in rock) 195, 119 Professor 49, 115 Prisoner 135, 239 Injured man 10, 36 Antibiotics and saw 151, 121 Monk (in tree stump) 85, 174 Scroll 91, 173 Disk 100, 225 Computer 244, 199 General's bunker 135, 239 Officer's red uniform 190, 65
Always have at least one fuel can, and one medical kit, if possible.
The best vehicles are hovercrafts, the faster helicopters, rocket boats and jeeps. Always try to have a vehicle that can travel over water, unless on a large expanse of land.
Use aerial observation units when approaching a target to scout for SAM launches. If so, a boat rather than a helicopter should be considered.
Always remain at high altitude when travelling through enemy territory.
Always plot the safest, not the quickest, route.
Only swim short distances if possible.

* Keep on the move and keep firing all the time.
* The sentinel moves in a fixed pattern, to kill it fire about 50 shots.When approaching the sentinel, keep to the right hand side of the screen.
* On Level Four never touch the left hand side of the screen. IT'S FATAL!
* Take time to work out the alien attack patterns. When first starting, begin in the middle of the screen, 'cos aliens come from the top and bottom of the screen.
* Don't change to ground combat unless you're going for a token.
Level skip: Enter MYAGI at the high score screen. Press the key P to advance to the next level.

Tower 1 Goto the terminal. Select time bomb and robot off. Jump gap and search safe. Leave room.
Tower 2 Fall down and search locker. Take lift up and search locker. Take lift down again and jump off about a third of the way down, avoiding the robot's laser bolt. Search object. Jump onto lift and jump left twice. Search plant. Go to terminal. Select time bomb and robot off. Jump left and then jumpon lift. Take lift to middle level and search locker. Take lift to the top and search safe. Leave room.
Tower 3 Take lift to top. Search four chairs. Drop to lower level. Search machine and cupboard. Wait until lift is at the bottom. Just after the robots blast the lift passage way, take the lift up. Before you reach the top, jump right. Go to terminal. Select time bomb and robot off. Search safe. Take lift down. Jump left onto middle platform. Search two office chairs. Leave room.
Tower 4 Enter from left entrance. Jump over gap and jump left again. Search tube. Jump right and search both tubes. Wait until robot is just about to turn away from you, then jump left twice. Search object. When robot is facing the other way, jump right and then left. Jump over gap to left. Search gadget. Fall to left. Go to terminal and select time bomb. Search safe. Fall to bottom level and search both plants. Leave room.
Tower 5 Fall down and search machine. Jump right and search both machines, avoiding all mines. Jump left. Go to edge of platform and jump right. Move left a bit then jump right. Access terminal and select time bomb. Move left a bit and jump right three times. Jump left then move a little bit to the right. Jump left and search the safe. Jump left twice to leave.
Tower 6 Jump gap and then jump left. Search cupboard and jump right. Wait until the lift comes down before jumping onto it. Take lift to the top. Search three cupboards. Take other lift down. Go to terminal, select time bomb, lift reset and robot oft Jump left. Move to robot and then jump right. Fall down to safe. Search safe, leave room.
Tower 7 Search box and cupboards. Take lift down. Search box and cupboards, avoiding mines. Wait until lift comes down and then jump on it. Take lift up. Search box and cupboards. Wait until robot is near the safe and facing left before taking lift down. Go to terminal. Select robot off and time bomb. Search safe. Leave room.

Invincibility: Pause (P key), then resume when your character is knocked down.
Change game speed: Press X + 1 for a faster game, or X + 4 for a slower game.
Type 'ad astra' (in lower case) while on the high score table to gain infinite lives.

row.CRCValue: Also known as Stunt Tracker Racer.

row.ProgeammerName: Jon Ritman, Bernie Drummond, Colin Porch

row.SpecialText:
Combining armies: Armies may be combined, especially if they are not winning too many battles individually. Up to three artillery units can be in a single army.
Avoiding Mexicans and Indians: Always stay away from the Mexicans. When Indian territory is captured, move away.
Destroying enemy artillery: Hold Fire at the start of a battle for a better chance to destroy the enemy's cannon. Also try to destroy the bridge and stay out of the way of the infantry.

Invincibility: Move to the top of the wall of the castle and collect the following objects in order: cupcake, hammer, globe, apple, and faucet. James Pond may now enter any door and is invincible. Note: Falling off the screen will still harm your character.
Extra lives: Move along the inside of the first room to find five more objects whose first letters will spell the word "LIVES". Collect them in that order for extra lives.

Codes to type in while playing:
FREZ Freeze the game PAC Pacman moves across screen FISH Makes a fish leap out of water BIRD Bird flies across screen PERI periscope rises out of water
Typing FUCK and CUNT results in an interesting message.

row.ProgeammerName: Alex Herbert, Martin Kenright, Virgil Fino

row.SpecialText: Select the define keys option and define the keys as Y, G, R, O (in that order) - you now have unlimited lives.

row.GameName: Barbarian II : The Dungeon of Drax
row.WhereStored: ST\B\Barbarian II - The Dungeon of Drax.zip

row.SpecialText: Extra lives: Move left past the 'Continue' door on the screen with the continue and quit options to find four extra lives.

Cheat mode:
Pause game play and type russian air to enable cheat mode and view the game objects. Resume game play and press N to advance to the next level.

row.ProgeammerName: Alan McCarthy, Steve Grand, Ian Saunter, Rob Chapman, Paul Dobson

row.SpecialText:
Type in STARION whilst playing the game then select any of the following codes:
B - Gives extended play Q - Gives you info about the program T - Adds ten seconds to your time S - Takes you through the locations D - Saves the screen in DEGAS format x - crashes the computer!

row.GameName: Parasol Stars : The Story of Rainbow Islands II
row.ProgeammerName: Mick West, Don McDermott, Matthew Cannon
row.SpecialText: Magic coins: Gold rods transform every creature that is killed into a magic coin that is worth extra points. Yellow lamps turn secret food into magic coins.
row.WhereStored: ST\P\Parasol Stars - The Story Of Rainbow Islands II.zip
row.Sounds: SNDH\P\Parasol Stars - The Story Of Rainbow Islands II.snd

row.SpecialText:
On the title screen, type "KILLUSPAL" to warp to level 999.
Fill the landscape with the maximum of 200 people to force one of the three hidden monsters to appear.
First load the conquest game as usual, and click on the game setup icon. Then select custom game and go to game options, changing anything you like. Finally click on evil, then two players, and then cancel. The enemy will now be unable to alter the landscape, preventing him from making any progress.

Extra experience points:
Enter ADKIWBKDCJZLTUWZ as a password.

Five credits: Press key 4 at the one or two player selection screen.
Type one of the following on the title screen, while the rainbow is cycling through colours:
"BLRBJSBJ"_____________________________Permanent fast shoes "RJSBJSBR"________________________Permanent double rainbows "SSSLLRRS"__________________________Permanent fast rainbows "BJBJBJRS"___________________________________________Hint A "LJLSLBLS"___________________________________________Hint B "LBSJRLJL"_______________________Continue after island five "RRLLBBJS"_______________All hidden food becomes money bags "RRRRSBSJ"____________________Does both of the previous two "SRBJSLSB"____________________Gives you 100 million counter

Extra credits: Load the game, then press key C at the high score screen. A list of various cheeses will be displayed on "Fat Mouse's Cheese Menu". Begin game play and type 'gorgonzola' to enable cheat cheese mode. Then, press key C to gain extra credits. Allthe bouncing bombs will be transformed into red edam cheeses, and the game text will be replaced with the word "Edam".
99 lives: Enter BLUESMOBIL, ANTIDOTE, ANTI-DOTE at the high score screen.

Extra lives: Begin game play and reach the "eye on a stalk" Boss at the end of level 3. Transform into the Gyroscope and remain on the Boss' head. The total number of remaining lives will slowly increase by one to a maximum of 99.
All weapons: Begin game play, then jump up and to the left. Climb up the hill, then jump again. Press [Space] and launch a "Wall of Death"; Jump into the block that appears and collect the weapons that appear.
Super attack: Note: This trick requires a Joystick with an auto-fire feature. When faced with a difficult situation, enable auto-fire, turn into gyroscope form, then press <Fire and activate a "Smart Bomb" simultaneously. Your character should fly around the screen while shooting all weapons.
Music test: Press [Undo] at the title screen.
Hint: Bonuses: Locate the waterfall on the last level of world 1, just before the Boss. Transform into a gyroscope on the left side of the waterfall and roll down it to find a hidden chamber with approximately one hundred diamonds.
Begin game play on the level in world two where your character enters an elevator shaft. Climb back up the shaft to find six bonus lives.
row.WhereStored: ST\T\Turrican II (1991)(Rainbow Arts)[cr Replicants & ST Amigos][t].zip

row.SpecialText:
The following listing (which must be type in using lower case only) will give you infinite lives.
10 rem omit line 30 if you are using the new ST basic 20 dim a%(770):cheat=varptr(a%(1)) 30 def seg=0 40 gload "a:start.prg",cheat 50 poke cheat+&h260,&h357c:poke cheat+&h262,&h302c

Bonus fruit: On level 1, shoot the first two monsters with bubbles, then fill the screen with bubbles. Then, bubble and burst the third and final monster. All bubbles still on the screen will turn into fruit.
Continue game play: After the last life is lost, hold Fire to regain a new set of lives with a score of zero.
Level skip: Press [F2] during game play to advance to the next level, [F3] to advance six levels, or [F4] to advance eleven levels.

Cheat mode: Type 'cheat' at the title screen to enable cheat mode and unlimited lives. Then, enter one of the following codes during game play to activate the corresponding cheat function.
Effect Code Level select [F1] through [F6] Boxing mini-game nude
Ninety-nine pets: Type 'choropoo' during game play.
Pause the game and press 'F10' six times to leave your opponent totally useless.

Cheat mode: Enter one of the following initials at the high score screen while holding [Keypad 5] when pressing the last letter.
Effect Initials Unlimited lives HSC Invincibility KDJ Acid men RLH Full fire power JGL Immune to damage RAB
row.CRCValue: One disk version

row.SpecialText: Invincibility: Press Fire to begin game play, then quickly type 'stephen broadhurst'. The phrase "Cheat Mode On" will appear to confirm correct code entry.

Cheat mode: Select a manual transmission, then attain a speed of at least 140 mph while driving downhill. Press N to shift into neutral to keep your car at this speed. Stay in neutral after the timer expires to continue driving to the next check point or the finish line. Your car will also be able to pass through vehicles or buildings; have sensitive steering; and will not skid out.
Easy high score: Select a manual transmission. Repeatedly select fourth gear while turning a corner or jumping when already in fourth gear to generate an error message. Click on the "Continue" option and repeat to attain a high score.
Hint: Racing the Phantom Photon: Drive through the signs on the speed track when racing against the Phantom Photon to gain an early lead.

Custom tracks: Create a folder named "FILES" on a blank disk. Load the game editor and design a track. Save the track to the "FILES" folder as any track from "A" to "E". Start the game and use this disk to drive on the custom track.

Spend 5,000 gold pieces: Select a character and play the "Castle of Mystery&quot" level. After locating the entrance to the Gold Mine, search for treasure to find 5,000 pieces of Fool's Gold. Intentionally allow your character to be killed by a monster. Resurrect your character, go to the shop, and purchase any amount of items. 1,680 gold pieces will still remain after all items are purchased. Replay the "Castle Of Mystery" level again to have the CPU to remove 5,000 gold pieces from the total and allow game play to continue.
Always find gold or potions: Select a Quest where the exit stairs are in the first room, such as in Quest 13. Search the room to find gold or a potion.

Cheat mode: Pause game play, type 'jc is the best' and press [Enter] to enable cheat mode. Then, press one of the following keys to activate the corresponding cheat function.
Effect Code Level skip N Kill all on-screen opponents [Delete] Extra lives [Semicolon] Kill opponent on bonus screen [Ctrl]
View penalty kick location: Repeatedly press 'R' after taking a penalty to view where the player is going to kick the ball.
Unlimited energy: Type 'david broadhurst wants to cheat' or 'karen broadhurst wants to cheat' during game play.

Always qualify: Begin a game in two player mode. Then, enter 'FIELDS OF FIRE' as a name for player one and 'IN A BIG COUNTRY' for player two.
Mini-game: Begin a game in two player mode. Then, enter 'ANGEL DARK' as a name for player one and 'HARVEST HOME' for player two. Then, enter 'MONSTER' and 'SEVENTEEN' as names to access a vertical scrolling shooting game.
Head start: Begin game play in two player mode. Allow the player in the lead to finish the race at the lowest possible speed. This will place his car just over the finish line when it crosses. Then have the other player intentionally crash into the rear of the stationary car to finish the race. One of the cars will disappear to confirm correct code entry. During the next race, the car with the slow finish should start in first place.
Stop CPU opponent: Press [F4] during game play.

Saving the pilot's table: Press [Esc] while viewing the pilot's table.
Easy points for final mission: Use the following procedure to get the 500 points needed for the final mission. Complete a mission, such as "Blue". Land, then press [Ctrl] + D to enter the debriefing screen. After receiving 100 points for the completed mission, choose the same mission. Press [Ctrl] + D before taking off to collect another 100 points. Repeat this procedure to collect a total of 500 points.
Note: To complete the "Blue" mission successfully, take off and fly to the submarine. Over fly it at low level, while keeping Reheat on to keep the Harriers away. Eject at any time once the submarine has been passed over. After parachuting, go to the Debriefing screen and collect the 100 points.
Cheat mode: Enter 'SEMPRINI' at the high score screen to resume the game at the last location played or enable level selection.
Freeze opponents: After entering a room, press the Joystick the direction of an opponent and hold Fire.

Cheat mode: Press [F9] to pause game play. Press the [Caps Lock], then hold [Ctrl] + [Shift] (in order). The game will restart with unlimited lives and disabled collision detection. Invincibility: Press [F9] to pause game play. Then, press [Ctrl]. Level select: Type 'no huns at hampden and no skol at ibrox' at the title screen. Then, press '0' through '9' during game play to advance to the corresponding level.

Cheat mode: Enter 'MAG' or 'MAJ' as a name for 5000 in fuel and 50 money credits.
Level skip: Type 'nitro' during game play to advance to the next level.
More lives: Press [F10] during game play.

Level select: Enter 'RAINBOW ARTS' as a name followed by a code phrase composed of: Level number in two digit format (example: 05) The letters XX Any four digits that add upto level number (example: 1220) The letters XX The level number in reversed format (example: 50) In the example, to start on level five, the name that would be entered is 'RAINBOW ARTS 05XX1220XX50'. Sound test: Enter 'COUNTRY' at the high score screen.

Unlimited lives (game one): Hold [Alt] + 1 + D.
Unlimited energy and credits (game two): Hold [Alt] + 1 + M.

Type "tcb lives forever" at the title screen. The screen will flash to confirm correct code entry. Press one of the following keys to activate the corresponding cheat function
Key Effect 1 Start at level 1 2 Start at level 2 3 Start at level 3 4 Start at level 4 5 Start at level 5 [F2] Press [Space] to advance to end of level Boss [F3] Press [Up] or [Down] to edit player stats [F4] Kill end of level Boss [F10] Pink border

Wings of death is the latest sensation in shoot-'em-up action: Seven Levels of Death-defying action. Five totally different weapon systems. Additional bolt-on weaponry (Hunter, Destroyer, Sheild, Autofire, etc.) Fifteen bonus types. Chunky animated end monsters. Extensive end sequence, Over 1 megabyte of Graphics. Smooth scrolling. Optimal use of any blitter. Intelligent use of any memory capacity up to 4 Mb.
Up to 95 objects on the screen simultaneously. Up to 512 colours on the screen in the title screen/menus. Speech Synthesis. Digitised sound effects. Optimal use of STe hardware. Support for centronics D/A Converters (ST only). One Megabyte of sampled sound. Storable high score table.
Thalion. What more could you want?

Amberstar requires 3 blank disks to install too. GamebaseST will put 3 blank disks into the GBGame\ReZip folder for you to use. If you don't have the ReZip Games option switched on in GamebaseST, you will loose your savegame when you run another game from GamebaseST. Alternatively you can manually move the blank disks files (6 in total) to another location on your hard drive and load them yourself into Steem to continue your game.

This one's cute. Type in 'Hamburger' at the title screen. The word 'Cheat' will appear below the credits press your joystck button, then (F5) when the jungle screen comes up. Your man is now invulnerable to the attacks of the little Commie @#!!$&*s. From here (F1) starts you where you are, (F2) puts you at the location of the explosives, (F3) takes you to the bridges that you have to blow up, (F4) takes you straight to the village where the entrance to the tunnels is hidden in one of the huts. From here on the cheat no longer works, the game runs as normal and you can die but it certainly gets you further along the track.

row.SpecialText: On the high-score table enter 207L, which should then be replaced by a row of dots (indicating that there's cheating afoot). When the next screen appears, press CTRL, ALT, Z and T to get the cheat mode running, allowing you to change the strength of the centrifugal force (what a strange cheat!). Zero will allow you to whip around the course at top speed without crashing at all, while the higher numbers will more than likely send you off the course at every bend.
